item.title: Quantitative UX research - Tom Clancy's The Division 2
item.description: This is the Master Thesis project that I completed at Massive Entertainment - A Ubisoft Studio . Research objective Psychometrics tools (e.g., Gamer Motivation Model ) could tell us why players want to play a certain game; but it is not very clear that how the motivations are reflected during actual gameplay. This research trageted on players of Tom Clancy’s The Division 2 , a tactical shooter action role-playing video game selling over 10 million copies worldwide, primarily aimed to address:
